config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The _transactionDeepCopyMode configuration option is used when creating a Prevayler instance in the create() method. It is passed as a parameter to the PrevaylerImpl constructor.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the _transactionDeepCopyMode configuration option depends on how often the create() method is called in the system. If the create() method is called frequently, then the _transactionDeepCopyMode configuration option will also be triggered frequently.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the _transactionDeepCopyMode configuration option on the system is related to how it affects the behavior of the Prevayler instance. Depending on the value set for _transactionDeepCopyMode, it can impact the memory usage and performance of the system.
